description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: German Parliament meets with Russian fighters flying low overhead to disrupt the meeting. Name of new street 17 June to commemorate anti-communist uprising in East Berlin 1953 - street fighting scenes during the uprising; Great 19th Industries Fair Hanover 1965; Lake Constance local scenery and historical places; Munich Ballet training at Munich Academy; 11 days State visit by HM Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip to Federal Republic; visits Bonn, Munich, West Berlin; boat trip on the Rhine; fireworks display.
